elements.name: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors)

steps.name: the user is on the Ansymo homepage
the user clicks the "Courses" link in the menu section
the user should see a page with all the courses listed

steps.name: for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor

name: Browse from home page to all course pages
description:
As a user of the ansymore.uantwerpen.be site
  I want to navigate to all the courses listed in the "menu" section of the homepage
  So that I can see information about each course and verify that each course has a professor.
